casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Christopher Georges DEGAND No. 247P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2018. Ann B. Petersen, James R. Glover, Attorneys at Law, Chapel Hill, for Degand, Christopher Georges Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina *379ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 7th of August 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2018."
